item.title: Theano: A graph computation framework - Notes and Tips
item.description: Although the library stops developing, it is worth to learn since there are many prominent papers using Theano. Besides, there are lots of stuff to learn from the implementation. So, Theano basically is a symbolic graphs of computation. Plus, it can do automatically gradient computing stuff. Learning Materials Fancy Presentation Installation sudo pip install theano To fix the inconsistent between float32 and float64, in .theanorc: [global] floatX = float32 Getting Started There are several conventions:
